node.title: Roadblock in place around residential fire in Ōtāhuhu
node.description: Emergency services are at the scene of a residential fire on Māngere Road in the Auckland suburb of Ōtāhuhu.
node.content:
["Emergency services are at the scene of a residential fire on Māngere Road in the Auckland suburb of Ōtāhuhu.", "", "
Due to a significant amount of smoke, residents have been advised to close their windows and doors and to stay inside (File photo). Photo: RNZ / Richard Tindiller
", "Motorists are advised to avoid the area as roadblocks are in place on Māngere Road.", "Due to a significant amount of smoke, residents have been advised to close their windows and doors and to stay inside.", "Pedestrians have also been advised to avoid the area."]
